Shorthand and Typewriting speeds of

    (i) NDU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Economics or Commerce 
and three (3) Arts subjects plus at least a pass 
in Mathematics at not more than two (2) 
sittings.  
(ii) RSUST requires credit pass in Mathematics.
